data.title: 05' 2016 - Renault Markerless AR

data.title: 03' 2016 - International women's day
data.description: From a particle system and data analyses twitter stream lab we came up with the idea to get tweets with #internationalwomenday and convert in a particle system with the faces of powerful women in the world
data.skills: node.js, express, twitter api, three.js, html5, css

data.title: 02' 2016 - Buses London
data.description: Processing data visualization lab using the public data from the bus stops in London.

data.title: 02' 2016 - Particle nodes
data.description: Processing particle system.

data.title: 11' 2015 - Zappos selfie sofa
data.description: Physical installation at the Barclays Center NY where the participant could have an conversation with the clt member and shoot a 7sec video recorded from a customized rail system attached to the ceiling.

data.title: 03' 2014 - Future Ville

data.title: 02' 2014 - Nexus Stages
data.description: One of the best projects that i've worked with, we build this puppet house where you could play a game with your mobile phone and controll a projected character who move physical components at the house
data.skills: Unity3d, node.js, socket.io, projection mapping, mad mapper, arduino, motors, led, 3d printing
